long_description: Get out of town and enjoy a walk in the wilderness with the REI Traverse 30 men's pack. It carries a full day's worth of gear while a contoured fit keeps you comfy over miles of trail. 30-liter capacity is ideal for day hiking; panel-loading pack has a top zippered pocket for organizing small items, such as sunglasses, hat, gloves, ID and keys. Internal sleeve accommodates the hydration reservoir of your choice (not included). 2 side mesh pockets create convenient storage and on-the-go access to water bottles, sunscreen, snacks or small electronics. Large mesh front pocket holds extras such as a jacket, hat and gloves; mesh pockets on the hipbelt provide storage for often-accessed essentials. Precurved shoulder straps and hipbelt provide a comfortable fit; padded back panel features multiple ventilation channels to help keep you cool. Lash points allow additional gear to be strapped to the front of the pack; side compression straps let you cinch down loads for jostle-free carrying. Sternum strap buckle doubles as a safety whistle; clip loop on front accommodates an LED blinker; tool loops secure an ice axe or trekking poles. REI Traverse 30 Pack features durable, recycled ripstop PET fabric for years of use. Special buy.
short_description: Get out of town and enjoy a walk in the wilderness with the REI Traverse 30 men's pack. It carries a full day's worth of gear while a contoured fit keeps you comfy over miles of trail.
